meanings.definition: One of a series of sloping beams that support a roof.
meanings.sent1: The rafters in the attic creaked under the weight of the heavy snow.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully inspected the rafters for any signs of damage.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to climb up the rafters and watch everyone from above.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, bouncing off the rafters like a joyful melody.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight streaming through the window illuminated the dusty rafters, creating a warm glow.

meanings.definition: A person who makes or repairs roofs.
meanings.sent1: The skilled rafter fixed the leaky roof in no time.
meanings.sent2: The rafter carefully measured the materials needed for the new roof.
meanings.sent3: The friendly rafter always had a joke ready while working on rooftops.
meanings.sent4: His hands moved swiftly, like a rafter dancing across the roof tiles.
meanings.sent5: The experienced rafter's work was so precise that the roofs never leaked again.
